headline: Best Buy Canada Selects PingPong As Their First Cross-Border Partner To Drive International Growth on its Marketplace
summary: Best Buy Canada has selected PingPong, a world-leading provider of cross-border embedded payment solutions, to become its first cross-border payment service provider of record on its Marketplace. Leveraging PingPong's easy-to-integrate API, Best Buy Canada will begin expanding internationally and facilitate payouts to international sellers.

headline: Best Buy (NYSE:BBY) Shares Drop 6% Following $475 Million Impairment Charge
summary: Recently, Best Buy (NYSE:BBY) announced a 1% increase in its quarterly dividend, payable in April 2025, reflecting confidence in its future cash flow despite a challenging quarter. The company reported fourth-quarter earnings with a marked decline in net income and EPS, indicating weaker financial performance. Additionally, the $475 million goodwill impairment related to its health unit highlighted strategic adjustments amid revised long-term projections. These developments come at a time...
